review: I received the additional "speaker" remote about a week before I got the actual Fire TV Stick.  I hooked it up to my HDTV and found that it works great.  I am in the process of checking out membership in a some of the sites that are on the home page such as Netflix, Hulu, etc.  The Fire Stick is all it claims and so easy to use.  I would recommend it to anyone, especially if you have Amazon Prime.  If you don't have Prime, it is worth the annual fee.I am under a contract with my cable company for their "Premier" services, but once the initial contract wears out it is my intention to drop their services down to basic cable so that I can get the local stations and some of the basic cables sites.
